oai_dc:dc.dc:title: School music choral group performing in the lobby of the Nashville Courthouse building, Nashville, Tennessee, 1978 December
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An unidentified school music ensemble that performed in the lobby of the Davidson County Courthouse, Nashville, Tennessee, circa December 12th - 21st, 1978. Forms part of Record Group 3, Metro Davidson County Photographer. 1 b & w filmstrip negative
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Davidson County Court House (Nashville, Tenn.); Metropolitan Nashville-Davidson County Public Schools
